2024-08-30T06-28-22Z.message: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

2024-08-30T06-28-22Z.workflow:
name: Check Content Version

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: '0 * * * *' # Runs every hour
  workflow_dispatch: # Allows manual trigger from GitHub Actions tab

jobs:
  run-script:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
      
    steps:
    - name: Checkout repository
      uses: actions/checkout@v3
      
    - name: Make script executable
      run: chmod +x scripts/check-version.sh
      shell: bash
      
    - name: Run check-version.sh script
      run: scripts/check-version.sh
      shell: bash
